data.name: Important Update (REAL Test 2024)
data.description:

To register yourself for REAL Test, visit realtest.pw.live
02.
Click on "Enroll Now" to keep yourself updated regarding "REAL Test 2024"  information.
03.
This batch is completely free on the PW App.
04.
All updates related to the REAL Test  will be provided in this batch.
05.
This batch is for students who are going to appear for NEET 2024.

data.name: Varun JEE Advanced   2024
data.byName: Targeted batch for JEE Advanced students
data.description:
01. Complete Syllabus of JEE Advanced.
02. JEE Advanced Concepts, Most Important and Expected Questions and PYQs.
03. We will cover Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics
04. 6 Days of scheduled classes.
05. The batch will include five recorded classes and one live class every week.
   06. PDF Notes of each Class will be uploaded on the PW App.
   07. 3 Lectures per day according to schedule.
   08. Advanced-based Daily Practice Problems with their Video Solution.
   09. Advanced Pattern Test will be held according to the Planner with their video solutions.
   10. The complete course will be accessible to all the students until the JEE Advanced 2024 Exams.
   11. Classes starting from 14th Feb 2024.
   12. Syllabus will end by 20th May 2024.
data.shortDescription:
Course Duration: 14 February 2024 - 20 May 2024.
Validity: Till JEE Exams 2024.
Online Lectures.
DPPs And Test With Solutions.
Offline counseling at Vidyapeeth Centre.
One-to-one telephonic PTM based on personalized SPD (Student Parent Dashboard).
Physical Support and helpdesk at Offline Vidyapeeth Centre.
Subjects: Physics, Chemistry & Maths.

data.name: Lakshya JEE AIR Recorded 2025
data.description:
01. This batch is designed for 12th-grade students aiming for JEE Mains & JEE Advance.

 

02. We will cover Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.
03. The complete syllabus of JEE Mains & JEE Advance will be covered
04. Recorded lectures will be provided on the PW application.
05. PDF notes of each class will be uploaded on the PW App.
06. Daily practice problems in quiz format will be uploaded on the PW application.
07. Topic-wise Practice sheets and standard book material questions will be uploaded on the PW application.

 

08. PDF notes/lecture notes of each class will be uploaded on the PW App, as per the faculties' requirements (optional)

 

09. Scheduled tests will be held according to the planner.
10. Parent-teacher meetings (PTMs) will be conducted once every 2 months to discuss the child's progress report

 

11. A detailed progress report will be provided to the parents, which will assist in tracking the academic performance and overall development of the students.

 

12. The complete course will be accessible to all students until the JEE Advance 2024 exams.

 

13. The syllabus will be completed by September 30, 2024.

data.name: Class 12th JEE One shot (Lakshya JEE YT)
data.description:
01. We will cover the complete syllabus of the 12th JEE in summary.
02. We will cover Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.
03. All students can revise their concepts throughout this series.
04. All lectures will be provided in Recorded Form.
05. 3 Days Of Schedules Classes With Three Lecture Per Week.

06. PDF Notes of each Class will be uploaded on the PW App.
07. Each lecture will be 60 minutes.
08. Classes starting from 30 October 2023.
09. The Syllabus Will Be Completed By 31 Jan 2024.

data.name: JEE Cheat Sheet Series
data.description:
01. This batch is completely FREE for all the students aiming for JEE 2024
02. Chapter-wise guidance for each chapter of each subject.
03. Guidance for What to study and what not to study.
04. Each Class will be in Recorded Format on our JEE Wallah YouTube Channel.
05. 30 Important Questions of each chapter in PDF Format will be uploaded on our PW App.
06. Daily Practice Sheet with answer key will be provided on the PW App.
07. Classes will start from 2nd January 2024.

data.name: MANZIL for JEE 2024
data.description:
01. This batch is Completely FREE for all the students aiming for JEE MAINS 2024
02. Will cover the complete JEE Syllabus of Physics, Chemistry & Mathematics
03. Each Class will be LIVE on our JEE Wallah YouTube Channel
04. 6 Days Scheduled classes with One lecture each day
05. Chapter wise One Shot will be conducted with PYQ’s
06. The Weekly Schedule will be provided in the community section of JEE Wallah’s YT Channel & Announcement section of the PW App
07. Class Notes in PDF Format will be uploaded on our PW App
08. Daily Practice Sheet with Text solutions will be provided.
09. Weekly Tests based on the Syllabus of that week will also be conducted.
10. Classes will start from 22nd November 2023.

data.name: Midterm Sprint - 8th
data.description:
01. This FREE batch is for our CBSE Class-8th Students
02.  We will complete each subject (Term-1) in One Shot with theory and most important questions.
03. Subjects included - Physics, Chemistry, Biology, SST, English, and Maths.
04. Classes will be LIVE on our PW Little Champs
05. Classes will start from 28th August till 8th September 2023
06. Weekly schedule will be provided on our PW Little Champs.
07. Notes will be available on our PW App.

data.name: BPSC Prelims Test Series 2024
data.description:
01. Preliminary Test Series consist of 20 tests - 14 Sectional  Tests & 6 Full Length  Tests.
02. Detailed solutions and answer keys will be provided after the test.
03. Tests will be conducted in both Hindi and English
04. Subject wise specific test
05. Full-length test
06. Preliminary Test Time Duration (Selectional Test): 2 Hrs
07. Preliminary Test Time Duration (Full Length Test): 2 Hrs
08. The test series will be as per the updated BPSC syllabus
09. Test series serves high-probability questions.
10. One- third  negative marking in Preliminary examination.

data.name: CS Executive: Siddhant December Attempt
data.byName: For the students of CS Executive
data.description:
01. This batch is for the students of CS Executive.
02. It will cover Following Subjects: Module 1 Subjects: Jurisprudence, Interpretation & General Laws Supplements, Company Law & Practice Supplements, Setting Up of Business, Industrial & labour laws Supplements, Corporate Accounting & Financial Management, Module 2 Subjects: Capital Markets & Securities Laws Supplements, Economic, Commercial & Intellectual Property Laws Supplement, Tax Laws & Practice : Supplement Part I (Direct Tax) & Supplement Part II (Indirect Tax)
03. Courses will be completed by Nov 2023 for CS Executive.
04. All the classes will be provided recorded in our Youtube & PW App/Web.
05. Class Notes will be provided in PDF Form as the class gets over.
06. This batch is helpful for Revision.
07. Chapter Wise DPP will be provided to Students on APP.

data.name: Lakshya JEE Fastrack 2024
data.description:
01. Complete 12th board and JEE Syllabus will be covered.
02. We will cover Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.
03. 6 days scheduled classes will be held.
04. Classes will be recorded, per day 3 classes will be held.
05. Each Class duration will be 1 hour 30 mins.
06. PDF Notes of each Class will be uploaded in the Lakshya JEE Fastrack 2024 batch on PW App.
07. Daily Practice Problems with their Video Solution in Quiz format.
08. Dedicated faculties for solving doubts through best-in-class doubt engine.
09. Peer-to-peer doubt-solving will be provided.
10. Scheduled tests will be held according to the planner.
11. NCERT Discussion with Most important back exercise questions solution.
12. Test analysis and Student parent dashboard will be provided.
13. The complete course will be accessible to all the students until the JEE 2024 Exams.
14. Classes starting from 20th September 2023.
15. Syllabus will end by 10th January 2024.

16.
Module PDF of Two chapters of each subject will be uploaded in batch.

data.name: Arjuna JEE 2023
data.description:
01

Complete Class 11th (JEE Mains and Advanced) Syllabus for Session 2022-23. üéØ

02

Bridge Course (Basic Class 11th Topics) will be provided in this batch.

03

We will cover Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.
Live Lectures will be provided from 8th June.
In case you missed the live class you can see it's recording any number of times.

04

Lecture Planner & Test Planner has been uploaded in the Batch's Notice Section.

05

Dedicated faculties for solving doubts through best-in-class Doubt Engine. 

06

Daily Practice Problems (DPP) & its Video Solution of each Lecture will be uploaded after Lectures.
The batch will be accessible till JEE ADVANCED ENTRANCE EXAM 2024.

07

Syllabus Completion by Jan 2023.

08

Only First 2 chapters module PDFs will be provided to students for each subject.

09

NOTE: There is No REFUND Policy. You can change batch between Arjuna JEE or Arjuna NEET within 15 days of your purchase. 

10

NOTE : PW Wallet points are capped for new batches. PW Wallet points can be availed for purchasing batches only. 

‚úíÔ∏è NOTE : None of our PW Yoddha ,official retailers and PW community members would ask you to make payments on another platforms other than official PW APP or Website. Any form of coupon or link will redirect you to PW App or website only.Please Avoid paying any amount to individuals through PayTM, Google Pay, Phonepe or any UPI platform.
